# UITrait

**Type Alias**

A type representing a trait in a trait collection.

## Declaration

```swift
typealias UITrait = any UITraitDefinition.Type
```

## Discussion

The type of a trait serves as a key to uniquely identify a trait in a trait collection. The [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITraitCollection/subscript(_:)-96v58] method of [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITraitCollection] and [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITraitChangeObservable-67e94/registerForTraitChanges(_:handler:)] are two examples that take trait types to identify traits in the collection.

## Custom traits

- **UIMutableTraits**: A mutable container of traits.
- **UITraitDefinition**: A type representing a trait in a trait collection.
